inn1.comm: The first ball is banged in short, from round the stumps, just outside off stump, Ganguly waits on the ball and chops it to third man where there is a slight fumble and Ganguly comes back for the second
Up and running with a four here. Short again, bit more width and Ganguly forces it off the back foot through cover point.

Dragged on. It landed on a length, outside the off stump and held its line a touch, Ganguly's bat came outside the line as he pushed at it, without moving his feet, away from the body and the ball collided with the inside edge before crashing into the stumps. Four and then gone.
on the middle stump line, again holding its line and pushed to the leg side
leans forward to defend to the off side

landed on a length outside off stump and came in, Gambhir covered his off stump and shouldered arms. End of an successful over. Pakistan have struck pretty early. As Phil, a feedbacker says, "short but not so sweet from Ganguly".
In the zone outside off stump and Tendulkar lets it seam past him
length delivery around the off stump line, Tendulkar leans forward to defend to the off side.
144.kmph delivery, full and straight, Tendulkar offers the full face of the bat as he pushes it straight down the track. The ball bounces once before climbing over Gul who jumps up to make the stop.

Ouch. This one was banged in short and the left shoulder, Tendulkar shaped to play before deciding  to withdraw his bat from the line and take it on the body. The ball ran off the left shoulder and he picks up two leg byes
on a length, around the middle stump line, Tendulkar gets right behind the line to turn it to the on side
sharp bouncer - the pitch looks pretty hard- and at the body, Gambhir takes the bottom-hand off the handle and plays it down to the backward square leg region.
teasing delivery. It was full, on the off stump line and swung late, Tendulkar pushed at it a touch tentatively but with soft hands and the ball runs off the outside edge to third man
full in length, on the stumps, defended to the off side

another bouncer and words are being exchanged between the bowler and the batsman. Drama. It reared up at Gambhir who ducks under at the last minute. Akthar says something and Gambhir doesn't want to remain mute either.
fuller, around the off stump, Gambhir leans forward to dab it to the off side
jaffa. It landed on a length, just outside off stump and cut in sharply. Tendulkar's bat went outside the line and he was cut into half.
gets behind the line of the length delivery and nudges it away
fuller, straighter and Tendulkar works it to wide mid-on for a quick single.
harmless bouncer that sails above Gambhir's head.
edged but falls well short of the second slip. It landed on a length and angled away, Gambhir pushed at it and it bounded off the gloves.
full and outside off stump, Tendulkar drives it through the covers.
sails down the leg side. wide.
full and straight, around the off stump, Tendulkar leans into his square drive, times it sweetly but straight to Afridi at point. Its a no ball and so the next one will be a free hit
This one is a wide. Akthar went for a bouncer but it climbs over Tendulkar before flying over Akmal
backs away, tries to slog the free hit delivery away but gets a bottom-edge, along the ground, to Akmal
full in length, in the zone outside off stump, Tendulkar lets that one to go through to the 'keeper
fuller, straighter, on the off stump line, Tendulkar drives with the full face of the bat to mid-on
full in length, around the off stump, pushed to cover where Afridi rushes in to stop a single
short in length, outside off stump, Tendulkar tries to force it off the back foot but ends up mistiming it to point.
whipped away for his first boundary. It was delivered from wide of the crease, angled in towards the middle stump and Tendulkar wristed it through midwicket.
full in length, on the off stump line, steered to point
full in length, on the stumps, Tendulkar tries to work it to the on side but gets a inside-edge on to the pad
on a length, outside off stump, Tendulkar goes back and across, square drives on the up to point
fuller, closer to the off stump, Tendulkar pushes it towards mid-off.
on a length, around the off stump, Tendulkar tries to punch it on the up straight down the ground but ends up mistiming it towars mid-on

on a length, just outside off stump, Tendulkar taps it close on the off side, towards say short extra cover region and rushes across for a quick single. Hold on there is a over throw as Afridi has a shy
short in length and forced away towards point where Afridi moves quickly to his right, lunges to make a stop
on a length, around the off stump, punched to right of mid-off for a single

run out chance missed. Gambhir would have been a goner. It landed on a length, around off stump, Tendulkar pushed it towards mid-off and set off for a run before changing his mind. Gambhir, by then, had reached the middle of the wicket, turned back but was well short of the crease as he watched Malik's throw miss the sticks
beaten. It landed on a length, just outside off stump and held its line, Tendulkar pushed inside the line and the ball zipped past the outside edge
lands on a length, bounces up to hit the top half of the bat as Tendulkar jabs at it.
beaten again. This one shaped away at the last minute. It was pretty full in length, Tendulkar,  was on the back foot and stabbed at it  as he tried to play across the line but the ball curved away.
on a length, on the middle stump line, Gambhir nudges it to the off side and Tendulkar calls him over for a quick single
surprise bouncer - the pitch is hard - and it rears up at the ribs, Tendulkar fends it off in an ungainly manner
149.2 kmph, short in length,  just outside the off stump line, Tendulkar went for a pull shot but was beaten by the pace and edged it to the off side
Fuller, on the stumps, driven to cover
creamed through point. Fullish, well outside off stump and Tendulkar leaned forward to unfurl a square drive.
full and on the stumps, turned to the on side
on a length, around the off stump, Gambhir drives to mid-off
143 kmph, short in length, landed on the middle and leg, moved towards off stump line, Gambhir hopped back, got on top of the bounce and defended it to the off side
banged in short, at the body, Gambhir arches back to short-arm jab it away over square leg
beaten In the zone outside off stump, full and angling away, Gambhir was struck adhesively to the crease - is he sponsored by Fevicol?!- and had a loose flash.
full again, around that off stump, Gambhir is touch late in getting forward but manages to do it at the end and pushes the delivery to covers
full in length, well outside off stump, Tendulkar went back and across, tried to reach it with a square drive but failed and the ball went through to the 'keeper
leans forward to drive through extra cover
slower one, around 123 k, full and well outside off stump, Tendulkar spots it late, goes for a slash but can't connect
goes for an yorker, it falls a trifle short of its target and Tendulkar wrists it past the short fine-leg fielder
edged past second slip. It landed on a length, outside off stump and Tendulkar went for a cover drive but the ball went to the third man boundary.

Three in a row and India are on the move. This one was the best of the lot.  It was on a length, just outside off stump and Tendulkar waits on it before opening the face of the bat to square drive it through cover point. India have reached 54. It was a sedate start but now they are up and running.
full on leg, tapped away to the short midwicket fielder
fulla and wide, slashed away furiously past point, on the front foot and square driven with a fine balance, races away to the fence for four
cramps him up a bit this time, tucked away to the on side
glided away to third man for a single
136kph that time, on middle, moving away to off, Tendulkar pushes tentatively, thickish edge goes to the off side
angled away to fine leg for a single, good comeback from Tanvir after a wayward start
short and on the pads, turned away with minimum fuss to the fine-leg fence for four, too easy from Tendulkar
slashed away furiously to third man for a single, didn't get hold of it, has to settle for a single
full and outside off, carved away to third man for another single, the Indians playing a lot in the V (behind the wicket that is)
short of a length and on middle and leg, tapped away down the ground and back to the bowler
keeping it tight again, on middle and off, not allowing Tendulkar the room to free his arms, tucked away to mid-on
good finish to the over, worked away to square leg but straight to the fielder
short of a length and Gambhir angles his bat to get a single to third man
good probing delivery, outside off and moving away, Tendulkar watches it all the way, lets it go finally
full-length ball and cracked away to the cover region, good athletic dive at cover and they're kept down to three
pushed to mid-off, defensive push
tucked away to the fine-leg region for a single
length ball again and cramping him for room, tapped back down the ground to the bowler
on a length, just outside off stump, Gambhir steers to point
charges out, even as he backs to the leg side, and Rao hurls it further outside off and Gambhir couldn't reach it
leans towards the line of a length delivery outside off and pushes it into covers
Dropped by Akmal. It was full in length, outside off stump, Gambhir drives on the up and gets a edge which flies low and just in front of Akmal who couldn't quite wrap his gloves under the ball.
picks the short-of-length delivery early and goes back and across to pull it in front of square leg
fuller, on the leg and middle, mistimes a flick towards square leg
on the middle stump line, on a length, turned to the on side
whipped away past square leg. Fullish, on the middle and leg, and Tendulkar wrists it behind square leg. Tendulkar is looking pretty good there. Nope, I am not woofing him.
corrects his length and sends this one just outside off stump, dabbed to the off side
from round the stumps, lands on a length, on the middle stump line, defended to the on side
fuller, on the off stump line, coming in with the angle, Tendulkar doesn't move his front foot out, just bends his knee a touch and drives pleasingly to cover
on the middle stump line, on a length, nudged to the on side
bouncer, Tendulkar shapes to pull but withdraws at the last minute as he sees the ball heading outside off stump.
50 up for Tendulkar. 86th ODI fifty. What a career he has had. Uff. Mindboggling. This one was full and on the middle stump line, enough for Tendulkar to whip it through midwicket
short in length, just outside off stump, forced away but straight to point
on a length, just outside off stump, steered to left of backward point where Butt makes a half stop
leans forward to defend a length delivery on the stumps to the on side
on the stumps and Gambhir nudges it away to the off side
banged in short, at the body, Gambhir swivels a touch late and still goes through with his pull shot and gets a top edge to the fine leg boundary
outside off stump and Gambhir guides it to backward point region for a single
picks up a single with a glance off the hips
length delivery around the off stump, steered to point
Imperious. Pre-determined shot. He walked down the track, going diagonally towards the leg side, and slapped a length delivery over mid-off.
slower one, off cutter, Tendulkar waits on the ball before turning it to square leg region for single. 100 up for India
harmless bouncer, sailing well above the batsman's head and a wide is called.
it lands on a length, on the middle stump line and Gambhir allows the ball to come and defends to the off side
fuller, straight and on the middle stump line, pushed past the bowler to the left of mid-off for a single
again Tendulkar backs to the leg side, attempts an heave to a fullish delivery over midwicket but inside-edges it to right of fine leg
More predetermination from Tendulkar. This time shuffles right across the sticks but Gul keeps it on the off stump line and he dabs it away to the leg side for a single
full in length, on the middle stump line, flicked through midwicket
slower one, on the middle and leg, Tendulkar waits on the ball before wristing it to fine leg
full in length, outside off stump, Gambhir goes for a drive but the bat-face shuts and the ball rolls over to covers
crack. It was short in length, outside off stump, Tendulkar glided back and across to play a stunning square cut. Fab shot.
on the middle stump line, turned to the on side
fullish, sliding down the leg side and Tendulkar mistimes a glance to left of Akmal
floated outside off stump, a tad short too and Gambhir goes on the front foot to slap it past point.
arm-ball this time, Gambhir picked it late and managed to bring bat in front of the pad to keep it out
on the middle and leg, worked past square leg for couple of runs
short again, outside off stump, cut away through point
floated outside off stump, on a length, Gambhir stretched well forward to knive it over extra cover
on the off stump line, dabbed to the off side
welcomes Afridi into the attack with a four to thirdman boundary. A fraction short and a tad wide outside off stump, Tendulkar went forward before going back to play a lovely late cut
slower this time, on the off stump line, Tendulkar leans forward to defend
flighted delivery outside off stump, Tendulkar tries to lap it around the corner, misses and is struck on the pad
slider, on the middle stump line, Gambhir was expecting it to turn down leg and got a leading edge to the off side as he pushed at it with a shut-face of the bat
Tendulkar is not allowing Afridi to settle down. Down he came the track to flay a delivery around the off stump over extra cover. As Ravi Shastri would say, Pakistan need a wicket here!
short in length, outside off stump, cut to backward point
runs are coming in a flood. A fraction short and pushed through quickly, Gambhir goes back and across to cut it past backward point. They need to slow up the pace here.
he does this time, floats one just outside off stump, nudged to the off side
well outside off and a wide is called
rocks back to cut a short of length delivery but can't beat the backward point
on a length but Gambhir stays back and punches it through cover point and by the time the sweeper cover comes around he picks up two runs
full and just outside off stump, square driven through cover point for couple of runs. Tendulkar is on the attack here.

What a fab shot to bring up the 150. He backed outside leg stump and he drove it inside-out - bottom hand powering that stroke- over long-off. I thought he just chipped it over the infield but it kept sailing.
lands outside leg stump and turns in slightly, Tendulkar swivels to pull it and it went straght, along the ground, to short fine leg where Yousuf makes a mess and gives away runs
backs away outside leg again, Afridi keeps it on the middle and leg stump and Tendulkar adjusts to defend
pushes a full delivery through extra cover for a single
on the middle stump line, Tendulkar comes down the track to drive to long-off. He didn't reach the pitch but went through with the drive
full in length, spinning away from the off stump, again Gambhir chooses to go back and punches it to point
bring up his fifty in style. It was short in length and Gambhir, who likes to cut and pull the spinners, rocked back to pull it to the cowcorner
outside off stump, mistimes a cut to point
free hit coming up as he over steps. Harsh call, the replays seem to suggest that some part was behind the line.

Finally Tendulkar has made use of a free hit. He had a couple that he missed out in the Australia series and one earlier today. This time he shuffles to the off side to play a paddle shot to the right of short fine leg
retains the strike with a drive to long-on
moves outside leg stump and carves a short-of-length delivery to deep midwicket
stays back to cut past point for a single
spins in towards the hips, Tendulkar goes back to wrist it to left of short fine leg
outside off stump, off a length, dabbed through backward point
loopy flighted delivery outside leg stump, again from over the wickets, Tendulkar misses a sweep shot and it runs off the pad.
moves to 99. It was a short of length delivery around the off stump, Tendulkar went back, opened the bat-face and guided it to wide third man
Ah! waste of a bouncer, sailing over Tendulkar and climbing over Akmal too
on a length, around off stump, dabbed to point. Gambhir charges across but Tendulkar sends him back quickly.
beaten Edgy to get a century eh. It was a length delivery in the zone outside off stump, Tendulkar has a poke. Almost fatal. He has been out 4 times in the 90s this year.

And he won't get here too. This is the 5th time he has fallen in 90's in ODI this year, 3rd time he has got out on 99 in this year.. It was a length delivery outside off stump, held its line and Tendulkar tried to run it to third man for the single but sent it to right of Akmal who dives to take a fine catch. Almost Kris Srikkanthish dismissal. Guiding it off the face of the bat.
on a length, around the off stump, pushed to cover point and Tanveer allows him to get off the mark with an overthrow
on the off and middle line, dabbed to the off side

floats a delivery on a length around off stump, Sehwag is struck on the pad as he pushes forward in an attempt to work it across the line. It hit him in front of off and middle, the ball was sliding in and that was close.
gets off the strike with a dab to midwicket
goes on the back foot to cut through point. He has been prolific in that region against the spinner. Now and then, he would suddenly charge out to hit over cover
on the middle and leg, flicked through square leg
on a length, on the middle and stump line, defended to the on side
90.5 mph, full and on the off stump, Gambhir was beaten for pace there as he went for a cover drive, the ball hit the bat and rolled away to the off side
Twin strike. Gambhir follows Tendulkar. Fullish, on the middle and leg, whipped straight to Afridi at midwicket. Soft dismissal and Pakistan swing right back into the game.
91.1mph, delivery just outside off stump, Yuvraj shoulders arms
straighter and Yuvraj times it sweetly to mid-on
on a length, just outside off stump, Yuvraj leans forward to defend it back to the bowler.
wide down the leg side and Akmal moves quickly to collect
slower through the air, dipping full toss and Sehwag lunges out to drive to long-on
pushes through cover point for a single
slips down the leg side and Sehwag works it to fine leg
leans forward to drive, misses and is hit on the pad
on the middle and leg stump line, turned to midwicket
on the middle and leg stump line, Yuvraj pushes back and works it behind square leg for a single
a touch short in length, just outside off and Sehwag cuts it to right of point where Salman Butt dives to make a half-stop

Ouch. Yuvraj Singh is hit on the right shoulder. It was banged in short, Yuvraj tried to duck under but it didn't climb as much as he expected and the ball crashed into the shoulder as he tried to go down
another bouncer but this one goes down the leg side
short of length, on the off stump line, punched to cover
full in length, on the off stump line, Yuvraj mistimes a drive to the on side
beaten. It landed on a length and shaped away late from Yuvraj who tries to punch it through point. End of a fine over
off the pads to the square leg region, no room for a single there
punched down to long-on for an easy single, a more sedate looking Sehwag
flicked away off the pads to deep square leg
worked away on the off side
in the slot and driven hard but straight to the fielder at short cover
steps forward and punches it well wide of the fielder at short third man
good length delivery on the middle and leg, Yuvraj looks to work it away through square leg but fails to make contact

that's more like it! good length delivery, bit too wide outside the off stump. Sehwag goes back and across and nicely drives it past the fielder at gully, got enough bat on it to beat the fielder in the deep
poke and a miss outside the off stump, typical nothing shot from Sehwag, luckily for him the leather missed the wood, on this occasion
bouncer on middle and leg, Sehwag ducks under it comfortably
punched away off the back-foot for a quick single
take that! slightly short and on the stumps, Yuvraj gets enough time to rock back and pull it away to the vacant midwicket fence
way down the leg side
and again, similar line - Akmal does well to get to it
bit of width offered outside the off stump and Sehwag drives it over the top to the deep cover region
worked away on the leg side
better line and length, worked away defensively
quicker delivery, defended down
driven through covers for a brace
slightly short, enough width and Sehwag taps it down to third man for two more
flicked away off the pads to the fine leg region
full and in the slot outside the off stump, Sehwag waits for the ball and nicely drives it past the fielder at cover, again just a single
138.4kmph bouncer and Yuvraj sways away from the line
on a length, angling away, Yuvraj punches it through cover point
fuller, on the middle and off stump line, Yuvraj is late in picking the length and inside-edges an intended straight drive to fine leg
length delivery just outside off stump, steered to point

attempted yorker, falls just short of the blockhole, just outside off stump and Sehwag plays a lovely dab to wide third man. The balance was perfect as he just leaned back a touch and guided it through backward point.
flighted delivery on the middle and leg, flicked past square leg
lands on the middle stump, turns towards off, driven to long-on for a single
full and on the middle and leg, Yuvraj tries to turn it to the on side but doesn't connect well
well outside leg stump, Yuvraj misses to connect with his sweep shot and the ball rolls of Akmal's pad
slider, comes in from the middle stump line, wristed past square leg for a single
on the middle stump line, dabbed to the on side
fuller, bit more air and Yuvraj drives to long-off for a single
down the leg side, must have brushed Yuvraj's pad en route to Akmal.

yorker, dead on target - on the middle and off stump line, Yuvraj just about manages to bring his bat down in time. Both think about a single before Sehwag sends Yuvraj back in time as Tanvir rushes across the turf
beaten outside off as he has a flash at a length delivery
fuller, on the middle stump line, turned to right of midwicket where there is a fumble
another one down the leg side, this time Yuvraj gets neither bat nor pad to it. It would have been a wide but no ball was called first as the bowler over stepped the front crease
yorker outside off stump, Yuvraj can only chop it to backward point
fullish, on the off stump line, driven to long-off for a single
outside off stump, cut to deep point
tossed up, full in length, driven powerfully to long-off
slightly short in length, pulled to deep midwicket for a single
on the hips, tucked behind square leg for a single
The death rattle. The off stump has been pegged back. A quicker one, a slider on the off stump line, Sehwag tried to give himself some room and cut but missed it completely.
Akthar misfields at long leg. Fullish, on the legs, flicked away to long leg where Akthar makes a complete mess of a regulation stop
outside off stump, Yuvraj drives, gets a inside edge, along the ground, and Akmal makes the stop
on a length, just outside off stump, jabbed to backward point
on the off stump line, Yuvraj opens the bat-face and guides to short third man region
short in length, coming in towards the hips, clipped away to Shoaib who doesn't make a mistake this time.
from wide of the crease, round the stumps, full and angling in towards middle stump, pushed to the off side
starts off with a 134 kmph delivery outside the leg stump, Yuvraj shuffles across and tickles it to fine-leg boundary
Again down the leg side, around 137 k, Yuvraj fails to connect with his glance and a wide is called
on target this time, on the middle and off stump line, defended to the off side
Arggh .. again he slips another one down the leg side. Easy decision to call it a wide.
144.1 kmph, on a length, angling in towards the middle and leg, tucked past square leg
beaten. Fullish, outside off stump, Dhoni is caught in the crease and he lunges at the last minute as he shapes to drive but misses it completely
on the off and middle line, pushed through cover point for a single
deja-vu. Another one sailing down the leg side.
He shortens his run-up but it doesn't help as he sends yet another down the leg side. This is must be really hurting the captain. They are already well behind the over rate
gets it on target this time and Yuvraj, perhaps surprised at being made to play a ball, nudges it to point
short of length, outside off stump, sliced through point
fuller, straighter and Yuvraj leans forward to drive to long-on for a single.
on a length, angling in towards off stump, Dhoni stays back to punch it to deep cover

Caught at deep midwicket. It was a slower one, a tad short in length, coming in from just outside off stump and Yuvraj had to adjust to the change of pace but decides to go through with the pull and sends it high towards the deep midwicket fielder
way way outside the off stump. A Test-match wide in fact.
beaten. It drifted in the air towards the off stump and shaped away off the seam, completely squaring up Uthappa. It was super delivery. Almost Akramish.

Similar delivery - it landed on the off stump line and moved away at the last minute, Uthappa again pushed at it as he lunged forward and is hit on the pad. Replays sugges it would have missed the off stump.
again from an shortened run up, on the off stump line, dabbed through cover point
on the off and middle line, defended down the track
Hmm.. another wide outside off stump. The clock is ticking.
on the stumps, nudged past square leg for a single
leans forward to punch a length delivery to mid-off
lands on a length, around the off stump, angles away, Pathan jabs at it, gets a inside-edge to on side
full and on the off stump line, Dhoni is late in getting forward and pushes it to cover
Another wide down the leg side. What is happening out there? Is the dew kicking in?
full and outside off stump, Pathan inside edges an intended cover drive to fine leg
from round the stump, drifts in the air towards middle stump, straightens - he has been bowling that ball consistently - Dhoni adjusts to the movement and pushes it past the bowler
outside off stump line, steered to point
on the middle and leg, whipped to midwicket

One more wicket down. India have lost their seventh wicket and are in danger of being bowled out before the 50 overs. It kicked up from short of length, outside off stump, Dhoni went for a cut but was done in by the extra bounce
greets him with a short-pitched delivery, at the ribs, tucked past square leg
beaten outside off as he pokes at a length delivery angling away from him
another one around the off stump, worked towards midwicket
lands outside off stump, on a length, Harbhajan drives to cover
outside the off stump, Harbhajan lets it go through to Akmal and the Pakistan fielders rush to their fielding positions to get ready for the next over.
here we go again. Yet another wide down the leg side
gets a single with a drive to long-on
yorker, from round the stumps, on the off stump, jabbed away through backward point
swinging delivery well outside off stump, Pathan tried to chop it away but failed to make any contact
similar delivery and this time Pathan carves it over cover for couple of runs
on a length this time, outside off stump, Pathan runs it down to third man
fullish, on the middle and leg, Harbhajan shuffles across to whip it , in the air, through the vacant midwicket region
full in length, on the middle and leg, driven to long-on for a single
lands on a length, around the off stump, Pathan stands up tall to punch it but can't beat the cover fielder
Pakistan continue to fightback. Akthar bowls a bouncer at the body, Irfan, never comfortable against the short one, is late on the pull short and top edges it to fine leg
short and wide, swing and a miss
fuller, outside off stump, guided to third man for a single
kicks up from short of length, just outside the off stump, Zaheer has a lame poke and is beaten
full pitched on the legs and Harbhajan whips it over square leg and as he runs across to the other end he collides with the bowler. He apologizes immediately, Rao accepts and all is well.
full and outside off stump, guided past point
length delivery on the stumps, Zaheer defends to the off side
on the middle stump, off a length, dabbed to cover, Zaheer wants a run, Harbhajan sends him back and it spins away from Afridi who over ran a touch as he rushed in. That allows them to complete a run
climbs up from short of length, Harbhajan is surprised and fends at it ungainly and it lobs straight up but falls before Akmal can run in
keeps the strike with a dab to cover point
in the zone outside off stump, off a length and holding its line, Zaheer stays inside the line and tries to push it to the off side but misses it completely
slower one this time and Zaheer plays inside the line again
on a length, around off stump, steered to backward point
nagging over continues. Shoaib, who has been bowling from a shortened run-up, again beats the bat.
another dot ball. Fantastic for Pakistan, It was a length delivery outside off stump, Zaheer tries to flash it away but no wood on leather
maiden over and that's the end of Shoaib's spell. Full in length, coming in towards middle stump, defended to the off side
short in length, on the off stump line, Harbhajan plays his short-arm jab over square leg for couple of runs
Oh ho! he now swings a short-of-length delivery over deep square leg. He walked down the track and pulled it high over the ropes
well outside off stump, Harbhajan goes down on his knee and tries to square drive but can't reach it
yorker length, on the off stump line, Harbhajan digs it out and gets it past cover.
slower one, just outside off stump, Harbhajan waits on the ball before punching it to long-off
goes for a yorker but it falls short of the blockhole and Zaheer plays a gem of a stroke. He goes down on his back knee to square-drive it over point.
leg side full toss and whipped to deep midwicket
slider on the middle stump line, Zaheer goes back to push it to the on side
slower through the air, on the off stump line, cut past point
just outside off stump, late cut to short third man
slow in the air but a tad wide outside off and Zaheer cuts it to deep point
Harbhajan is having fun out there. He waltzes down the track ,reaches the pitch and creams it to the straight boundary
the last over begins with a swing and a miss. Akmal gathers and runs in with the ball to kill any thought of a single
yorker length delivery on the off stump line, inside edges a drive to short fine leg, Zaheers wants a run, Harbhajan doesn't and Akmal runs Zaheer out with a direct hit
full in length, driven through covers for a single.
backs away a touch and swats a length delivery on the stumps to wide midwicket region
Harbhajan goes downtown. Full, right in the slot, on the middle, Harbhajan clears the front foot and smokes it over the long-on fielder. What a strike.
yorker length this time, on the stumps, jabbed away to the on side for a single

inn2.comm: Too far down leg side, wide called and rightly so. Looks like some swing and seam out there
and again, Zaheer struggling to control the movement it seems, that's a good line to the right-hander but Butt just needs to let that go
that's a beauty this time, outside off and moving away, Butt pokes tentatively but doesn't make contact
too far down leg side again, Zaheer struggling with his line here
another beauty this time, he's mixing up good ones with the wides, Butt beaten again
glided away to third man for a single, first runs off the bat
beaten outside off. It landed on the stumps and moved away, Akmal followed it , bat away from the body and is beaten
full and swinging in, on the legs, Akmal misses the flick shot, the ball runs off the pad and down to fine leg boundary.
angling away from Akmal who steers it to third man
starts of on target, on a length around off stump, shaping away from Salman who pushes it to point
on the middle and leg stump line, holding a touch, Salman tucks it behind  square leg for a single.
jaffa, cuts him in half. It landed on a length, on the off and middle and bent it to thread the bat and pad gap and flew over the stumps
crack. Too short and outside off stump, carved over cover
fuller, coming in towards the off and middle, Akmal takes care not to plonk his front foot across and plays it quietly to covers
just outside off stump, Akmal plays it late and runs it down to third man
big shout for lbw but it landed outside leg stump. It was full in length and moved in towards middle and off, Akmal falls over a touch on the front foot as he pushes at it and is hit on the pad
moves away from the stumps, Akmal chases it and is beaten
again falls over a touch in the front foot as he tries to work it to on side and is hit on the pad
fuller, outside off, Akmal square drives it to right of wide third man where Sehwag makes a diving stop near the ropes
on a length, around that off stump, pushed to point
short in length, on the off stump line, punched to cover. That was sweetly timed but he didn't pick the gap
slipping down the leg side and the umpire extends his arms
beaten. It lands on a length, on the off stump line before curving away, Salman flirts at it
swinging delivery outside off stump, but the swing started too early in its trajectory and Salman had no problem in letting this one go
on the stumps, coming in from middle and leg, worked to square leg
closer to the off stump, holding its line a touch and Salman jabs it away to the on side
drifts on to the hips - the right-left combination doing its damage- and Akmal clips it away to fine leg boundary where Zaheer dives in vain
short in length, slanting away from Akmal who punches it to Yuvraj Singh at point. Again sweetly timed but straight to Yuvraj
on a length, just outside off stump, cut to backward point
lands on a length, outside off stump, jagged back in to cramp up Salman who gets a inside edge to short fine leg as he stabs it
fuller, on the leg and middle, Akmal is struck on the front pad as he loses balance  on the front foot, trying to play across
short in length, outside off stump, Salman bends his back knee and slashes it past the second slip
short again, on the stumps this time and Salman picks the length up and pulls it through midwicket
again short and width too and Salman cuts but straight to point
full pitched on the legs, flicked to long leg

full and swinging in late, on the middle stump line, Akmal stays adjacent to the line and drives to right of cover where Uthappa dives to make a half-stop. The ball goes to his right and Gambhir swoops in and has a direct hit at the non-striker's end and they pick an overthrow
Blinder from Yuvraj at point. It was short in length, angling away from Akmal who blasted a cut to the right of Yuvraj who manages to hang on to a stinging catch
gets a bouncer first up and he ducks under. One for the over, says Suresh Shastri, the umpire
good delivery but the wrong line. It was a inswinger but started from the leg and middle and hit Younis on the pad.
takes this one away from Younis who lets it go through to Dhoni
full in length, on the off stump, driven well and to left of covers where Uthappa makes a fine diving stop
fuller, just outside off stump, pushed down the track, past the diving Zaheer and it ricochets off the sticks at the other end and they pick up a single
on the middle and leg, drifting down and Younis flicks it to RP Singh at long leg
just outside off stump, on a length, pushed to point
a touch more width offered this time and Salman bottom-hands a cut through cover point.
full and curving in towards middle, driven to mid-on
on the off stump line, again shaping in late, Younis goes for a on drive but the inward movement meant the ball collided with the inner half of the bat and ran past square leg
lands on a length, on the middle and off stump line, moves away, Salman was about to be squared-up but adjusted to the movement and jabs it to the off side
full and swinging outside off stump, left alone
another one that nearly squares up Salman with late movement but again he adjusts to push it to the off side
lands on a length, on the middle and off stump line, defended on the front foot
on a length, outside off stump, shaping away, left alone
on a length, on the middle and off stump line, dabbed to the cover region
on a length, a trifle short may be, outside off stump, slashed away with the help of a thickish edge to third man
133.9 kmph, on the off stump line, steered to point
on the middle and leg, turned to squae leg
on the off stump line, shapes away and Salman guides it to point
fullpitched, swinging in, on the middle and leg, Younis leans forward to play a lovely chip stroke over wide midwicket
full and on the stumps, driven to the off side
well outside the off stump, Younis leaves it alone and a wide is called
another one well outside off stump as RP tries to slant it across the batsman
closer to the off stump, Younis leans forward, opens the bat-face and steers to third man
sprays this down leg too. Suresh Shastri is getting some exercise
better, on the off stump line, Salman dabs it to the off side
full and outside off stump, steered to third man
on a length, outside off stump, punched to cover
short and wide, Salman plays a fiesty cut but Uthappa gets in the way, moving smartly to his right at cover
on the middle stump line, turned to the on side
slipping down the leg side and Salman helps himself to a boundary to the fine-leg region
fuller, outside off stump and Salman square drives to point. The bottom-hand powers his square drives and cuts, its more a wristy whip rather than a cut
short and Salman makes him pay with a pull over midwicket. He has a fine record against India and he continues to make merry against them
lands on a length, on the middle and leg, moves towards the hip, tucked behind square leg
full and outside off, left alone
short in length, coming in towards off stump, Salman goes for a last-minute short-arm pull and is struck high on the pad
fuller, around the off stump and Salman glides forward to caress it through extra cover
beaten. Drags back the length a touch, hits the good length this time and moves it away late. Salman pushes at it tentatively.
brings this one in, on the middle stump, Salman had kept his front foot across and had to bring his bat around the pad to make contact. He manages to do it and sends the ball behind square leg
lands outside leg stump, on a length, swings in a touch but stays outside leg and a wide is called
fuller, straighter, on the middle stump, punched to midwicket
full again, on the middle stump line, driven to mid-on
on the off stump line, pushed to the off side
on the middle and leg, turned to midwicket
Short, wide, slapped. Salman went back and across to square cut it past a diving Yuvraj Singh at backward point
corrects his length and Salman drives to cover
on a length, on the middle stump line, Younis pushes it to covers
lands on the middle stump line, moves away a touch, steered to third man region for a single.
leans forward to defend a length delivery on the off stump line
comes in from just outside off stump, jabbed away close on the off side and they rush across for a single
leans forward to a length delivery outside off stump, and jabs it away to the off side
beaten. It landed on a length, on the middle and leg and moved away past the outside edge as Younis gets squared up
lands on a length, on the middle and off, moves towards off, Salman pushes it towards mid-on
fuller, outside off stump, Salman goes down on his back knee and square drives it to wide third man
short of length, just outside off stump, Younis shuffles across and dabs it to the on side
well outside off stump, Younis Khan can't reach it

Big wicket. Salman is out. It was a slow off cutter, coming in from just outside off to cramp-up Salman who stabbed at it. The ball missed the bat, clipped the flap of the front pad and went on to the stumps

big shout for lbw as Yousuf is struck on the pad by an inswinger. It was full, on the middle and leg, curved back in and Yousuf fell a touch on the front foot, trying on the front foot and was struck in line. Close.
beaten, It landed on the middle stump and shaped away and Younis is beaten, pushing inside the line
leans forward to defend a length delivery
on the off stump line, going away, steered to backward point
outside off stump, cut and a miss, beaten by the extra bounce
landed on a length, outside off stump, Yousuf is again in trouble on the front foot as the ball curves in to strike him high on the pad
leans forward to punch a length delivery to extra cover
short in length, coming in towards middle stump, defended to off side
fuller, swinging in, on the legs, turned to the on side
Shout for lbw as the ball again curves in off a length to strike Younis on the pad. It was probably going down the leg side, though.
full in length, outside off stump, Yousuf tries to force it through the off side field but misses it completely
in cutter, coming in from just outside off stump, cramping Yousuf up and it hit his right glove before striking the pad as he tried to cut
charges out and drives a length delivery to right of cover where Rohit Sharma, the substitute, makes a half stop and the ball rolls towards mid-off
short in length, outside off stump, Younis rocks back to cut to left of deep point where Gambhir makes a diving half-stop
fuller, on the off and middle stump line, Younis leans forward to dead-bat it to the off side
nice. It was short in length, outside off stump, Yousuf leaned forward, played it late as he placed it to left of Yuvraj Singh at point.
fuller, on the off and middle line, shaped in, Younis makes contact with the inner-half of the bat and the ball rolls to midwicket
slower one, fullish, dabbed back down the track
short in length, outside off stump, steered to point
full and outside off stump, Younis goes for a drive but misses it
on the stumps, Younis lunges to drive but the bat rotates in his hands and the ball runs towards midwicket
on a length, around middle and off stump, pushed to the off side
jags back in sharply from outside off stump, Yousuf edges it on to the pad as he pushes at it
fuller, outside off stump, Yousuf drives and Uthappa misfields it and the ball rolls towards mid-off
just outside off stump, full in length, late cut for a single
on a length, on the off and middle, defended on the front foot
full and on the middle and off stump line, partly edged partly steered to cover point
Sharp spin there. It landed well outside off stump, on a length, Younis stretched across and was surprised at the turn and the bounce but manages to jab it away
fuller, leans forward to play with the turn to midwicket
turns in from outside off, Yousuf waits for the spin to play out before wristing it gently towards square leg
slightly short in length, outside off stump, cut to deep point
just outside off stump and Younis plays a lovely late cut  to third man. Pathan comes across to make a diving stop. Ganguly applauds the effort
on a length, around off stump, steered past point
full and outside off stump, well outside in fact but Yousuf tries to paddle it away and is struck on the pad.
fullish, just outside off stump, Yousuf leans forward, waits on the ball before opening the bat-face to guide it to third man
on the stumps, worked to Harbhajan at midwicket
full and on the middle, driven to long-on for a single
leans forward, waits for the turn before wristing it behind square leg
comes down the track, it dips rapidly in front of him and he adjusts to push it to midwicket
quicker, flatter, on the off and middle, wristed past square leg
floater outside off stump, a tad short and Younis punches it to deep point.
Done in by the doosra. It landed on a length, just outside off stump, sucking Yousuf out of the crease before it broke away, leaving him stranded. Dhoni breaks the stumps and India strike
turns in from just outside off, punched to long-on
short in length outside off, driven on the up to deep point
full and straight, on the middle stump line, driven to long-on
big shout for lbw as Malik is struck marginally outside off stump. He pushed forward, the ball cut in and was saved by the point of impact.
leans forward to defend a length delivery to covers
on the stumps but a tad short and that allows Malik to stand up tall and punch it down to long-on
on the stumps, tapped to the on side
short in length, on the off stump, creates room by backing away to the leg side and cut it through covers
comes down the track, reaches the pitch and drives to long-off
floated outside off, turns in, Younis plants his left foot across and plays with the turn to short fine leg region
on the off stump line, driven to Uthappa at cover
pushes that one through slightly quicker and worked past square leg
a touch short in length, on the off stump line, punched through point
lands on the length, just outside off stump, cuts in, whipped through midwicket
lands on the off stump line, on a length, holds its line, punched to mid-off
edged to the third man boundary. It was a length delivery that held its line outside off, Younis tried to force it through point and got a profitable edge
on the off stump line, coming in, stabbed to the leg side

Dropped and then missed a stumping! It was full in length, again holding its line, Younis drove inside the line even as he lunged forward and Dhoni couldn't hold on. Younis was out of the crease by then but the ball had run away from the 'keeper
on the stumps, turning in, dabbed to the on side
tossed up on the middle and he plays a reverse sweep through backward point
spins in from outside off, turned to midwicket
turned past square leg for a single
leans forward to drive past the bowler
on the off stump line, pushed to point
pushes this one towards long-0n for a single
six to fine leg! Full in length, on the middle and leg stump line, Younis stretched across and tried to swing it behind square leg but got a top edge that takes the ball over the fine-leg boundary
on the off and middle line, pushed back down the track
fuller, on the off stump, driven to Zaheer Khan at mid-off and they dash across for a quick single. Zaheer's throw bounced much before its target and the ball bounced over the stumps
on the off stump line, pushed to point
lands well outside off stump and turned sharply in but the length - it was short, allowed Younis to cut it through point
leans forward to turn a flighted delivery outside off stump to midwicket
lands well outside off stump, turned in, Malik waited for the spin to play out before dabbing it right of backward point
drives with the turn to wide midwicket region
fuller, outside off stump, driven to long-off for a single
gets to his fifty with a flick past square leg. Pakistan require 175 to win
short in length, turning in from outside off stump, cut away through backward point
leans forward to a length delivery to cover point for a single
on the off stump line, holding its line, Malik pushes it back down the track
full and straigth, on the middle stump line, driven with the full face of the bat , past the bowler
lands on a length, on the middle and leg, cuts down leg. misses an intended glance and Dhoni gathers and whips the bails off.
shifts his line back to outside off stump, Younis guides it to backward point
a touch short and Younis rocks back to pull it to RP Singh at deep square leg
leans forward and pushes a length delivery to cover point
gets this one into the gaps past backward point for a single
fuller, on the middle stump line, driven to long-on
pushes that one through quickly, on the middle, Younis backs away a touch to cut it to deep point
flatter, on the middle stump line, driven to long-on
slower, spinning in from outside off stump, turned to square leg
floated up on the off stump line,driven to long-on
this one swings away and Younis steers it to point

goes for a reverse sweep and pulls it off; the ball flies over towards deep point, Gambhir rushes across and gets a boot to it. Did it touch the ropes? The third umpire thinks so and a four is signalled.
swinging delivery on the stumps, defended on the font foot
Pakistan are on the attack. This time he opts for a traditional sweep shot; leans across to a seam-up delivery on the stumps and swings it to deep backward square leg region.
around off stump, steered through backward point
quicker delivery outside the off stump, Malik cuts off the back-foot but fails to make contact
dreadful delivery, short and drifting down the leg side, Malik stays back and pulls it away to the backward square leg fence, valiant diving effort in the deep ends in vain
punched away on the leg side

and gone! Harbhajan delivers another killer blow. Tossed up on the stumps, Malik comes down the track and tries to loft it over the long-on fence but fails to hit it cleanly. Pathan in the deep makes no mistake
worked away through square leg and he if off the mark first ball
punched down to long-on for an easy single. End of a successful over
full and drifting down the leg side, making life hard for the keeper - good diving effort from the Indian captain saves a certain boundary
another fuller length delivery, on the pads and flicked away to fine leg for an easy single
short of a good length delivery, pitched in line and angling across the right-hander. Misbah stays back and punches it down to third man for a single
pitched up and driven straight back, RP has a go at the stumps and hits the target. Younis was never in trouble. They take a single off the overthrow
short and angling across, Misbah goes for it but fails to make contact
another wide down the leg side - surprising
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, punched down to mid-off
better line and length. Good length and on the middle and off stump line, Khan on the back-foot defending
tossed up and turning in, Misbah waits for the ball to turn and works it away on the leg side for a single. Misbah is doing the right thing here, giving the strike back to Khan
Swept away in the air to the fine leg region, one bounce and straight to the Zaheer in the deep
worked away for the single

hard chance droppedgoes for the big one and ends up hitting it high up over mid-on, Yuvraj running back from mid-on fails to hold on to it. The man coming in from long-on should have probably gone for it - another day may be
punched down to long-on
turned to midwicket
full pitched outside off stump, driven through extra cover
full again, on the stumps, driven down to long-on
outside off stump, fullish, steered through cover point
lands on a length, on the middle stump line, moves towards middle and off, pushed  back down the track
another dot ball as Misbah drives a length delivery on the off stump to cover
on the middle stump line, swept to right of long leg
Full and quickish, Younis goes down on his knee and swings it over wide long-on. That will be handy for Pakistan and the toal crosses 200
picks up a single with a dab to midwicket. Over to you Misbah
he opts for a revere sweep, it was a full pitched delivery on the middle and leg stump, and he sweeps it to backward point region
full again, pushed through it quickly, swept to right of long leg
slips it down the leg side. Wide.
again slips down the leg side, loopy flighted delivery that landed on leg stump and spins down. Dhoni moves to his left, gathers and whips the bails off. The back foot was inside the crease
leans forward to push it to midwicket
in swinging delivery, on the legs, tickled to long leg.
fullish, outside off stump, Younis stretches forward to cream it, in the air, between extra cover and mid-off
outside off stump, paddled away to fine leg for a single.
backs away to the leg side, well before Ganguly released the ball and its full and on the middle and off stump line, Misbah tries to drill it through the off side, gets an edge to the leg side
picks up a single with a drive to the on side
slower one, on the middle stump, Misbah waits and waits before pulling it past square leg
outside off stump, dabbed to right of Yuvraj at midwicket
turns in from outside off, Younis plays it through cover point for a single
quicker, just outside off stump, pushed to Uthappa at cover. Pakistan need 104 for 70 balls
really full, right up there almost at the blockhole, turned to midwicket
Misbah goes for another reverse sweep. He gets it through backward point for couple of runs
pushes that one through quickly but just outside leg stump and its flicked away to right of long leg for another couple of runs. End of Harbhajan's spell.
dipping slower one, on the middle stump, Younis shapes to play across the line and gets a leading edge, in the air, towards mid-off region
stays back to drive to midwicket
another slower one, a touch short though, and Misbah swat-pulls it to deep midwicket boundary. 50 of the partnership comes up too
length delivery on the middle and leg, worked past square leg
fuller, on the off and middle, jabbed away to the on side
drifts down the leg side and a wide is called. Extra no 24
on the middle stump line, on a length, turned to midwicket. The fifth bowler's quota has been bowled out
starts off with a slower one, off cutter on the off stump, pushed to cover for a single
walks down the track, Pathan hurls it fuller and outside off stump, Younis jabs at it but doesn't connect.
bouncer and that sails well above Younis' head. He was charging out and so, Pathan banged it in but it went too high
short of length delivery, just outside off stump, Younis opens the bat-face, tries to guide it to third man but sends it straight to Yuvraj at backward point. Younis is on 97
shuffles across to the sticks, tries to lap a length delivery around the corner but almost holes up at the short fine leg region. But it fell well to the left of Zaheer Khan
on the middle and off stump line, pushed to midwicket where Ganguly misfields, misses the ball, it hits him on his knee and runs towards mid-on

That's it. He has reached his third ODI hundred. It was full and on the legs, he leaned forward, rolled his wrists over it and got it past Zaheer at short fine-leg region. Younis is keeping Pakistan in the hunt. The helmet comes off and he raises his bat to the dressing room. The crowd applaud. Pak need 83 to win. Afridi is still in the hut. Game on.
dropped by Uthappa, running to his right at long-off. Misbah walked down the track and drove it right over the bowler's head. Uthappa rushed across, lunged at the end but clanged it
yorker length delivery on the middle and leg, worked past square leg
full, right up there, dug out towards long-off

hits the deck short of length, Younis pulls it to deep square leg region. RP Singh pulls it back from the ropes and Sehwag is there with the throw. The runs are coming at a fair clip. The match is set up nicely
bang. Low full toss and Misbah says thank you and drills it through wide mid-on.
from round the stumps this time, full and on the off stump line, pushed towards extra cover for a single

off cutter, on the leg stump line, Misbah threatens to back away before getting in line and works it through midwicket. They run the first run hard and come back for the second run to beat the Gambhir throw
very well placed again. Gambhir is at deep midwicket  and Misbah flicks a delivery on the leg and middle - wrong line to start off with- past square leg and gets two again
shifts his line to off and middle this time, Misbah pushes it towards the silly mid-off region and picks up a single.
ah! nice paddle shot. Again Irfan targets the leg stump, this one lands outside leg in fact and Younis paddles it to fine leg boundary.
shifts his line again to outside off and gets a dot ball. Younis shuffles across, tries to dab it to third man and misses
sticks to the off stump line and Younis picks up a single with a dab to backward point
full, just short of yorker length, outside off stump, driven to long-off for a single
length delivery, angled away from Misbah who flashes it to right of Pathan at third man
walks right across the sticks, exposing middle and leg, RP keeps it outside off and Younis scoops it towards deep cover

again around the  off stump - he seems to have learnt from the previous Irfan over, full in length, pushed to extra cover, there is a direct hit at non-striker's end but he is home. Pakistan need 55 from 38 balls
fullish, just outside off stump, driven to Sehwag at extra cover and they hesitate before completing the run. It was Sehwag with the direct hit the last ball.
shuflfes right across the stumps, RP sends down a low full toss, but the line is on the off stump again and Younis laps it towards long leg
full in length, on the off stump line and Younis whacks it to wide long-on. Misbah pushes tor the second run and Younis responds
fullish, outside off, steered to backward point

backs to the leg side, exposing all three sticks, Irfan sends a slower one, on the leg stump line, pushed to extra cover. The best player that I  saw who made the best use after moving outside legstump was Salim Malik. Anyway back to the game
picks up a single with a drive through the off side
fuller, yorker length, again outside off stump - previous over he was guilty of bowling leg stump and outside leg- jabbed to backward point
around that off stump again, driveable length though, and its drilled hard but straight to long-off
low dipping full toss, outside off stump, driven to long-off where Yuvraj Singh makes the stop

The leg stump has been pegged back. Done in by the slower one. Younis shuffled across, intending to swing to the leg side, Zaheer sends a slower one on the leg stump, full and dipping just in front of the leg stump, Younis fails to connect with his swing and he is gone. It has been very fine knock from him. His third ODI century and his first against India.
Ah! starts off like Miandad. Just leans forward and taps it gently to the on side for a single.
full and outside off stump, driven to long-off for a single.
on the middle stump line, Afridi stays adjacent to the line and whips it past square leg
full in length, on the middle stump line, Afridi swings, makes contact but it goes hard, fast but straight to Ganguly at midwicket. Dot ball.

above waist-high no ball, swatted to the leg side. RP Singh puts his hand up in apology. Almost chest-high. Hence the apology. But since its not a front-foot no ball it won't be a free hit . Rubbish rule that.
full pitched, outside off, Misbah ( I had him out, didn't I? Blame my keyboard!) drives hard to cover
yorker length, on the stumps, dug out towards mid-on

Would you believe it? Misbah-ul-Haq must be feeling  a sense of deja-vu. Again out as he tries to walk across the sticks and paddle. That Twenty20 feeling all over again. It was full, straight, outside offstump, Misbah had walked right across the sticks, attempted a paddle, a lap around the corner but he sent it straight on to the stumps. Death rattle.
yorker ends up a full pitched delivery outside leg stump and Tanvir flicks it  away to fine leg boundary
lands on a length, outside off stump, Tanvir flat-bats it to long-on for a single

full pitched outside off stump-, Afridi drills it towards wide long-on, Rohit Sharma, the substitute fielder, rushes across, dives and makes a half-stop. The ball rolls towards the ropes, Rohit runs after it, picks it up but his fingers touch the ropes and after a referral upstairs, its given a boundary,
Slightly slower in pace, short in length, on the off stump line, Afridi swings it over the wide midwicket region. 25 from 15. Immense fun.
He walked first outside leg stump, then walked right across the sticks, got a dipping fullish delivery on the full and paddled it away to fine leg boundary.

almost caught by Yuvraj. Full, on the off stump line, right up there, Afridi swings across the line, gets a leading edge, in the air towards long-off. Yuvraj rushes in from there and throws in a full-length dive but can only get his fingers to it, can't hold on. Afridi survives, Pakistan gallop ahead, India sigh.
on a length, swung past midwicket for couple of runs.
Tanvir does his job. Gets off the strike with a drive to long-on. Lawson is seen inside the dressing room, giving batting lessons to Shoaib Akthar!
fullpitched, just short of the blockhole, on the off stump, stabbed to the leg side for a single
fullish, on the middle and leg, whipped to deep square leg . 14 from 9 balls. Afridi on strike.
Whoa! A six over long-off. It was a length delivery outside off stump and Afridi carved it over long-off. Up, Up and over. Ballistic.
fullish, outside off stump, square driven to point for a single. 7 from 7 now. Surely, Pakistan can't mess up from here.
retains the strike with a push to extra cover.
That has been deposited to deep midwicket boundary. It was a full toss - yep, a full toss- and he pulled it away to the boundary. Pakistan need just two runs.
slower one this time, outside off stump, Tanvir tries to dab it away to third man but makes no contact
Another slower one, again he is beaten. It landed on a length, outside off stump and Tanvir, again, tries to steer it to third man but ..
on the stumps, Tanvir levels the score by turning it to long leg. Tanvir wants to come back for the risky second run, Afridi wants to finish the game himself. So 1 run it is.

Pakistan have leveled the series. They win by 4 wickets. It was a racy chase. Full in length, Afridi backs away and drives the length delivery on the stumps to covers where Uthappa misfields. Game over.
